# TabletopInteraction.Value

**Structure**

A structure that provides the details about an interaction, such as the phase of the gesture and position of the equipment.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Value
```

## Getting information about the equipment and game

- **startingEquipmentID**: The equipment the interaction was started with
- **controlledEquipmentID**: The equipment the interaction is currently controlling
- **allowedDestinations**: The allowed destinations that this interaction can target

## Getting the phases

- **gesturePhase**: the current phase of the gesture
- **phase**: the current phase of the overall interaction
- **TabletopInteraction.Value.Phase**: The stages of players interacting with equipment on the table.

## Getting the gestures

- **gesture**: If this is interaction is currently gesture driven, contains gesture specific additional information
- **TabletopInteraction.Value.Gesture**: A structure that provides details specific to a gesture driven interaction.

## Getting the proposed locations

- **proposedDestination**: The proposed destination of the main interaction object, computed from the current pose of the object. During a toss simulation, the proposed destination is only updated if there is only one tossed equipment and it is the currently controlled equipment.
- **proposedFlip**: Was the object flipped from the start of this interaction

## Getting the position and location

- **pose**: The current pose of the main interaction object
- **locationOnTable**: The 2D location of the main interaction object
- **endLocation**: The expected end location
- **endLocationOnTable**: The expected end 2D location of the main interaction object

## Getting identifiers

- **id**: Identifier to recognize different interactions from one another
- **playerID**: The player who is performing the interaction

## Getting the interaction properties

- **configuration**: The current configuration of this interaction
- **constants**: The constants of this interaction
- **initialPose**: The pose of the equipment that the interaction was started with

## Getting the value of the interaction

- **value**: The current value belonging to this interaction.

## Conforms To

- Identifiable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
